characters.story: "JOO?" the fire questions curiously - is this a candle or a torch?
"CHOO!" she commands sharply - don't touch the hot stove!
The mouth bends down drooping as father admonished me before leaving.
"LAN?" the tree questions curiously - will it become a railing for the deck?
"LAN?" the fingers question curiously like a gargoyle - why do you impede my path?
"DZUNG!" the lower leg sings cheerfully, following the tracks through the woods!
The ear bends down drooping as I follow his shrug - he doesn't know either.
"JEE!" the doctor commands sharply, prescribing a pharmaceutical remedy!
"JAI!" the mirror image sings cheerfully though small - we abstain from food during the fast!
The fingers bend down drooping in the mirror image trying to squeeze into the crowded subway.
The metal push button bends down drooping when pressed.
"SHYOH!" the sheep sings cheerfully despite being shy at the petting zoo!
The thread bends down drooping in New York's garment district.
"PEE?" the lowly flesh questions curiously - is that the spleen or another organ?
"PEE?" the mouth questions curiously - is there beer at the party?
"BAY!" the lowly stone sings cheerfully - an ancient stele monument!
"HUH!" he commands sharply with illustrious authority!
"SHYAH!" the mouth commands sharply with illustrious words to terrify the children!
